forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High near 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low -2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. A few flurries or snow showers possible. Low around 30F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low -3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 38F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning with precipitation turning to a mixture of rain and snow in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 47F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. Low -3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the evening, becoming all snow late. Low 29F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 100%. 5 to 8 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers early becoming more scattered later. High -1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers will become more widely scattered in the afternoon. High 34F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%. Snowfall around one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low -7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 22F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low -4C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 26F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Flurries and a few snow showers throughout the day. High 4C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 30%. 2-3cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Some snow showers possible early with any snow changing to a few showers later. High 41F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low near -5C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 25F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 6C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around -5C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 25F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 21F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 51F. Winds light and variable.
